description: Nextract HMC PCM data system view

targets.query: SELECT "inlet" AS "Turbine Inlet" FROM "Energy" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("watts") FROM "Energy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "cpu_used" FROM "LPAR" WHERE ("lpar" =~ /^$Partition$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lpar
SELECT last(cpu_used / cpu_total) AS "cpu_used" FROM "Server" WHERE ("lpar" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(cpu_used / cpu_total) AS "cpu_used" FROM "Server" WHERE ("lpar" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(cpu_used / cpu_total) AS "cpu_used" FROM "Server" WHERE ("lpar" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT vios_fc_rbytes FROM "Server" WHERE ("lpar" =~ /^$ManagedSystem$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lpar

panels.title: $ManagedSystem VIOS Physical Fiber Channel Adapters write

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: ManagedSystem
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Server" WITH KEY = "lpar"

list.name: Partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "LPAR" WITH KEY = "lpar"

title: Power Systems HMC system view
